SELECT SUM(hiii.account) AS sumRepayCapital, SUM(hiii.repay_interest) AS sumRepayInterest FROM ht_borrow AS b INNER JOIN ht_increase_interest_loan AS hiil ON hiil.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style AS bs on b.borrow_style= bs.nid LEFT JOIN ht_increase_interest_invest AS hiii ON hiil.invest_id= hiii.id
